players.name: Alice
memory: You: "Since Bob was killed, I think it's essential to discuss who might have done it and why."
Diana: "Charlie is the one who killed Bob, I investigated him last night and discovered he's a mafioso."
Charlie: "I deny being the mafioso who killed Bob. I believe Diana is mistaken and that she might have a hidden agenda."
